General.Name: Sp8de
General.Description: Sp8de is a protocol for A blockchain-based platform with multiple features that are essential for the growing blockchain gambling industry and whose solid implementation is lacking in any of the currently existing projects in this space. SPX is an Ethereum-based token that allows users to access the universe of applications, to bet within the ecosystem and it's also used to reward the developers fairly on the protocol level. SPX is an Ethereum-based token that allows users to access the universe of applications, to bet within the ecosystem and it's also used to reward the developers fairly on the protocol level.

ICO.Description:
Sp8de is a protocol for A blockchain-based platform with multiple features that are essential for the growing blockchain gambling industry and whose solid implementation is lacking in any of the currently existing projects in this space. SPX is an Ethereum-based token that allows users to access the universe of applications, to bet within the ecosystem and it's also used to reward the developers fairly on the protocol level. SPX is an Ethereum-based token that allows users to access the universe of applications, to bet within the ecosystem and it's also used to reward the developers fairly on the protocol level.

Team:

  • Alexey Kashirsky: CEO & Co-Founder 
  • Mikhail Krapivnoi: CIO & Co-Founder 
  • Evgeny Borchers: CVO & Co-Founder 
  • Alexander Baykiev: CMO & Co-founder 

The Sp8de ICO began on the 8th of January and will end on the 11th of Marcha 2018. The ICO token allocation represents 80% of the total token supply and will be available for a 0.00001011245 ETH starting price. The ICO funding target/cap is set at $4M.

Token Reserve Split (20%):

  • 20% Business Development, Marketing, Bounties, Advisory

The SPX ICO features a bonus and bounty campaign.
